backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor for the AI Agents Catalog backend, handling entries, categories, and user profiles with role-based access control via an admin principal and AccessControl mixin.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping two frontend features (FeaturedSection rendering in CatalogPage and useQueries hook wiring) to their relevant files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON document containing one-sentence summaries of all frontend source files, serving as a reference for the project's component and hook architecture.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base CSS file defining OKLCH-based CSS custom properties for light and dark color themes used throughout the UI.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML entry point for the React app, mounting the root div and loading the main TypeScript module.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component rendering a sticky glassmorphism header with logo and LoginButton, the CatalogPage as main content, and a footer with a caffeine.ai attribution link.
frontend/src/components/AddToolModal.tsx: Modal dialog component for adding new AI tool entries, with form validation, dynamic category dropdown from the backend, and submission via the useAddEntry mutation hook.
Renders a 'Featured Tools' section with a sparkle header and responsive 3-column grid of ToolCards; returns null when the entries array is empty.
frontend/src/components/FilterBar.tsx: Horizontal filter bar with emoji-labeled category buttons, active teal gradient styling, and count badges for filtering the tool catalog.
frontend/src/components/HeroBanner.tsx: Renders a full-width hero banner with a background image, gradient overlay, logo, tagline text, and animated decorative dots.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Provides an Internet Identity login/logout button that shows the authenticated user's truncated principal ID with copy and expand functionality.
frontend/src/components/ManageCategories: Admin modal dialog for adding and removing AI tool categories, with validation, error handling, and a confirmation dialog for deletions.
frontend/src/components/SearchInput.tsx: A styled text input component for searching AI tools, with a search icon and a clear button that appears when text is entered.
frontend/src/components/ToolCard.tsx: Displays a single AI tool entry as a clickable card with category badge, optional featured styling, and an admin delete button with confirmation dialog.
frontend/src/components/ToolGrid.tsx: Renders a responsive grid of ToolCard components with skeleton loading placeholders and an empty-state message when no entries match.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous backend actor using React Query, invalidating dependent queries whenever the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and hook for Internet Identity authentication on the ICP platform, managing login/logout state, identity persistence, and AuthClient creation with configurable options.
frontend/src/hooks/useMutations.ts: Defines TanStack Query mutation hooks for backend write operations: adding/removing entries and categories, each invalidating relevant query caches on success.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines TanStack Query hooks for fetching entries (all, featured, by category), categories, and admin status from the backend actor, with appropriate enabled conditions and cache settings.
frontend/src/index.css: Global stylesheet that sets up Tailwind CSS, imports fonts, defines a dark-theme OKLCH CSS variable design system, and adds utility classes for glass morphism, glow effects, and gradients.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that renders the React app wrapped with TanStack QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/CatalogPage.tsx: Main catalog page component that displays a hero banner, featured tools, search/filter controls, and a tool grid, with conditional admin controls for adding entries and managing categories.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, and clearing URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage persistence support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration for the frontend, defining dark mode, custom color tokens using oklch CSS variables, typography, container queries, animation plugins, and extended theme values like fonts, border radii, and box shadows.
project_state.json: Tracks project state at version 3, recording existing features around FeaturedSection rendering and query wiring, a pending fix request (AR-1) to restore missing backend catalog data, and a known issue about missing Data and Featured Tools categories.
